mapper.select: SELECT ask.id, ask.qid,ask.content,ask.good,ask.bad,ask.uid,ask.gmt_create, user.nickname as username, user.avatar FROM red_ask_reply ask LEFT OUTER JOIN edu_user user ON ask.uid=user.id WHERE ask.qid=#{qId} ORDER BY ask.good DESC limit 10
